passiveDescription.0: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <cryo>4</cryo> Energy every 2.5s, and gain <cryo>0.3%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 Max HP they possess, up to <cryo>12%</cryo>. Primordial Jade Regalia will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.
passiveDescription.1: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <cryo>4.5</cryo> Energy every 2.5s, and gain <cryo>0.45%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 Max HP they possess, up to <cryo>18%</cryo>. Primordial Jade Regalia will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.
passiveDescription.2: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <cryo>5</cryo> Energy every 2.5s, and gain <cryo>0.6%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 Max HP they possess, up to <cryo>24%</cryo>. Primordial Jade Regalia will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.
passiveDescription.3: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <cryo>5.5</cryo> Energy every 2.5s, and gain <cryo>0.75%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 Max HP they possess, up to <cryo>30%</cryo>. Primordial Jade Regalia will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.
passiveDescription.4: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <cryo>6</cryo> Energy every 2.5s, and gain <cryo>0.9%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 Max HP they possess, up to <cryo>36%</cryo>. Primordial Jade Regalia will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.
